Posted By: Jinx585 (1/23/2010 10:40:41 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
One of the best tricks with this guy is to have him join in blocks with other creatures. If the opponent doesn't have enough damage to go around, you gain the life AND the moth stays around to gain life again next time.
  
   
Don't laugh now, but this creature is also an amazing unit to use with any creature who bands. Seriously. If you're attacked by a bruiser, have the banding creature eat all of the damage, and the moth still gives you life and lives.
  
   
4.5/5
posts.html:

4.5/5

posts.post_content: I had never heard of this card until I saw it on the Xbox Live game. At first, I was thinking that it was a stupid card. By itself, it's not all that great. You can cast a lot of other spells to gain live and if this guy dies without blocking, you don't get the life gain. However, combined with a regenerating spell or indestructibility, this guy can be useful. It's a useful and creative card.
posts.html:
I had never heard of this card until I saw it on the Xbox Live game. At first, I was thinking that it was a stupid card. By itself, it's not all that great. You can cast a lot of other spells to gain live and if this guy dies without blocking, you don't get the life gain. However, combined with a regenerating spell or indestructibility, this guy can be useful. It's a useful and creative card.
